description: Returns compliance details for each rule in that conformance pack.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: A ConformancePackComplianceFilters object. ConfigRuleNames (list) --- Filters the results by Config rule names. (string) --- ComplianceType (string) --- Filters the results by compliance. The allowed values are COMPLIANT and NON_COMPLIANT. INSUFFICIENT_DATA is not supported.

nested_params.name: ConfigRuleNames
nested_params.description: Filters the results by Config rule names.

nested_params.name: ComplianceType
nested_params.description: Filters the results by compliance. The allowed values are COMPLIANT and NON_COMPLIANT. INSUFFICIENT_DATA is not supported.

nested_items.name: ConformancePackRuleComplianceList
nested_items.description: Returns a list of ConformancePackRuleCompliance objects.

nested_items.name: Controls
nested_items.description: Controls for the conformance pack. A control is a process to prevent or detect problems while meeting objectives. A control can align with a specific compliance regime or map to internal controls defined by an organization.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The nextToken string returned in a previous request that you use to request the next page of results in a paginated response.
